meta.spec_summary: substring(start [, length]) extracts part of string. Start is 0-based. If start is outside string bounds, returns empty {}. If length exceeds remaining chars, returns remaining. Empty/zero/negative length returns empty string ''. Empty input/start returns empty {}.

todo: Improve passing rate (0/21 passing) - function not yet implemented (parse errors)
Verify error behavior for multiple items in input collection
Test interaction with other string functions

cases.name: substring - start equals length (empty result)
cases.note: start position is outside the string, returns empty collection

cases.name: substring - negative start
cases.note: negative start is outside string, returns empty collection

cases.name: substring - length exceeds remaining
cases.note: only one char remaining, returns that

cases.name: substring - length exceeds remaining from middle
substring - zero length returns empty string
substring - negative length returns empty string
substring - negative start with negative length
cases.note: start outside string takes precedence, returns empty collection not empty string

cases.name: substring - empty input and empty start
substring - empty length treated as omitted
cases.note: empty length behaves as if length not provided

cases.name: substring - entire string with exact length
